name: Witch Hunt (itch) (ensareray)
description:
Witch Hunt

Game Jam: GameDev Insiders Jam #1 ($450 in Prizes)

Theme: If you stop, you die

  • 3D Adventure

Too weak to fight but fast enough to run!

In this game we try to tell people story of a witch and a boy. When boy throw his ball in witch's garden Witch curses the boy. Boy has no choice except runing from curses and making up with Miss Witch. This little game made with joy and fun, I hope you can enjoy while playing too.

Thanks everyone who plays!

  • WASD or Arrow to move 
  • "E" to Joke to witch
  • Spacebar to roll

Who Contributed

Atilla Akakya

Ensar Eray Akkaya  EnsarEray#9525
